description:
The 260 Tech Long Sleeve Crewe is your ultimate companion for staying warm during the coldest months of the year, whether you're skiing, snowshoeing, or enjoying other winter pursuits. Designed for winter layering, it's the go-to choice when the temperature drops.

  • Merino wool naturally regulates your body’s temperature and resists odour
  • 260 weight merino is on the heavier side of midweight material and is perfect for those who find traditional midweight base layers a little too cold
  • Gusseted underarms to keep you moving comfortably, all day long Offset shoulder seams won’t get in your way
  • Flatlock and backward set seams add an extra layer of comfort, preventing irritation
name: icebreaker 260 Tech Long Sleeve Crewe - Men's
